statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:S3Bucket)<-[:APPLIES_TO]-(n:S3Acl) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:S3Bucket)<-[r:APPLIES_TO]-(:S3Acl) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
